# [color=purple]The Unseen[/color] [details=Show] > # [color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Debauchery (Night)** - Get in a player’s way, causing them to target you. You will be immune to any attacks you redirect. - Infinite uses. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy and get rid of your target’s immunities for the night. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Drunk**[/color]
> # [color=purple]**The Aristocrat**[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Pull Rank (Day)** - Your vote will count as two today. This will not be announced publicly or affect the number of votes required to reach majority. - 3 uses **Order (Night)** - Negate the votes of a target player the next day. They can’t accuse anyone or vote tomorrow. The target still counts towards the voting majority. - Infinite uses **Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Unseen then there will be an additional trial and execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Noble**[/color]
> # [color=purple]The Corrupted King :crossed_swords: :shield: [/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. If you are executed for treason, all players will lose their Royal Blood passive. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. - 2 uses **Decide Fate (Day)** - You may choose the whether the player on trial will be executed or pardoned. - 1 use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Permanent Scheme (Night)** - Target player will be immune to conversion for the rest of the game - 1 use (Starting King Only) *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Convert Immune

If they try to kill somebody, you will know. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Princess**[/color]

item.description:
The Alchemist

Neutral Support
Experimentation (Passive) - In the start of Day 1, you choose your win condition of 3 options.

Neutrality: Survive to the end of the game
The Evils: Ensure that the Blue Dragon is defeated
The Town Ensure that the Blue Dragon is victorious

Experimental Shield (Day) - You will be immune to death, occupation and redirection tonight. - 1 use

Concoct Potion (Night) - Choose from a variety of potions to use tonight. - Infinite uses

If “The Town” win condition is chosen then these abilities are gained:

Crimson Potion - Heal targeted player, if you successfully heal a player from an attack that is not you. This use of Crimson Potion will not be used up. - 3 use
Tar Potion - Prevent all players from visiting your target. - 2 use

If “Neutrality” win condition is chosen then these abilities are gained:

Tar Potion - Prevent all players abilities from visiting your target. - 3 use
Crimson Potion - Heal targeted player, if you successfully heal a player from an attack that is not you. This use of Crimson Potion will not be used up. - 2 uses

If “The Evil” win condition is chosen then these abilities are gained:

Misty Potion - Target player will be framed to Investigators tonight. - 3 use
Tar Potion - Prevent all players except attacking and conversion abilities from visiting your target. - 2 uses

Ensure the win condition that you have chosen is successful.
